TopicTitle: "Eve: Order Zero" -- a KSP Graphic Novel (POSTLUDE COMPLETE...bet you didn't see THAT coming.)

Articles.Content:
That was a fantastic answer.

Alas, I have to spread some rep around before giving it its due...

Well said, Val. Very well said. I hope Mort will get indigestion from that large ham he brought to the courtroom ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Has anybody else noticed that Val's pupils somehow have become detached from her eyes in the last part? XD lol....

> 
> Has anybody else noticed that Val's pupils somehow have become detached from her eyes in the last part? XD lol....

I didn't do it on purpose, but FWIW the same thing happened to Jack Nicholson.

![giphy.gif](https://media.giphy.com/media/3rgXBBPtZN9kVbHFM4/giphy.gif)

And here endeth the chapter.

![UjK5Ea0.png](http://i.imgur.com/UjK5Ea0.png)

![Wcu9iE4.png](http://i.imgur.com/Wcu9iE4.png)
Poor Mort. Realized he had a soul and blue, er, green screened his brain.
The prosecutor appears to broken. Will he restart?

I bet the 1.0.5 update broke his brain, lol.

You know, the contextural contracts and stuff.

That was great!!

Moving and funny and wonderful.

Thank you.

Happy landings!
Ctrl+alt+del doesn't restart! XD

\*puts tinfoil hat\*

Mort is a robot that's why he wanted to replace the kerbals with probes. Also explaining why the kill vehicle has a cockpit it could be piloted by an anti-meat bag KerBot
Villainous BSOD?
I think 1.0.5 broke Mort.
Boohoo.
Mort REALLY can't handle the truth ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> \*puts tinfoil hat\*
> Mort is a robot that's why he wanted to replace the kerbals with probes. Also explaining why the kill vehicle has a cockpit it could be piloted by an anti-meat bag KerBot

OMG you guessed it exactly!! Either that, or he's some kind of computer simulation (with a vestigial helmet collar.)

> 
> Villainous BSOD?

No error there, the kerb knows his tropes. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Poor Mort. Realized he had a soul and blue, er, green screened his brain.

> 
> Mort REALLY can't handle the truth ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Nope. And now DMan979 knows why I didn't want to discuss any closing arguments ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Next graphic novel: The Matrix 4: Kerbfleet

I fear the loominati will take over.

OH KOD! I FORGOT MY TINFOIL HAT!!!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-10T23:48:18Z" title="11/10/2015 11:48  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 10, 2015</time> by Sanic**

> 
> Nope. And now DMan979 knows why I didn't want to discuss any closing arguments ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I suppose I do. Great working with you, Kuzzter!

I would have wondered if there was a happy end. Kuzzter isn`t Kollywood, Kuzzter is serious entertainment.

***APPLAUSE!*** ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) claps hands while holding a cup of coffee...

\*pokes Mort with a stick\* Huh. I never thought large ham ingestion might cause total brain crash. Wonky physiology is wonky. Oh, well... As you were, everyone. Nothing to see here. Carry on my wayward Kerbals ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> \*pokes Mort with a stick\* Huh. I never thought large ham ingestion might cause total brain crash. Wonky physiology is wonky. Oh, well... As you were, everyone. Nothing to see here. Carry on my wayward Kerbals ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I suppose you are poking him to test for...rigor mortis? (![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) -->\*takes off sunglasses\* YEEEEAAAAHHHHHH...)

> 
> I suppose you are poking him to test for...rigor mortis? (![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) -->\*takes off sunglasses\* YEEEEAAAAHHHHHH...)

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Great joke!

> 
> No error there, the kerb knows his tropes. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I minored in tropology ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
lol - Space Cadet - my all time favorite Heinlein work... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> lol - Space Cadet - my all time favorite Heinlein work... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Then I should tell you as a Heinlein fan that Mikki's cadet uniform was influenced by the 'undress maroons' referenced in *Starship Troopers* ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
